about:
I love to introduce myself as a **competitive programmer**, with experience in programming and problem solving since the end of 2017. I've solved **1000**+ Data Structure and Algorithmic problems in several Online Judges. I've participated in National Level Contests.


I have a strong motivation for writing **server-side** code. I take a special interest in Designing **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, **Open source contribution**, Querying databases. I love to learn new things. I'm highly motivated and ready for newer challenges and want to learn new technologies.
